#summary upgrading the GH615 to a GH625

= Introduction =

Globalsat released a beta firmware for the GH515 that basically upgrades the software to that of the GH625, meaning lap support and configurable screen, and more.

= WARNING = 

The firmware is a beta, with all associated risk. Update at your own risk.

= Latest Version =

[http://code.google.com/p/gh615/downloads/detail?name=F-0TH-0C-0807311.GHX F-0TH-0C-0807311.GHX]

If you have a newer Version, please send it in.
